name: Physical Attack Boost
description: Increases ATK by 1 per level

name: Magic Attack Boost
description: Increases MATK by 1 per level

name: Max HP Boost
description: Increases HP by 1 per level.

name: Max MP Boost
description: Increases MP by 1 per level.

name: Physical Defense Boost
description: Increases DEF by 1 per level.

name: Magic Defense Boost
description: Increases DEF by 1 per level.

name: Accuracy Boost
description: Increases Accuracy by 1 per level

name: Dodge Boost
description: Increases Dodge by 1 per level

name: Attack Speed Boost
description: Increases ASPD by 1 per level

name: Magic Speed Boost
description: Increases CSPD by 1 per level

name: Wayfarer
description: Increases EXP Gain by 10% but lowers damage dealt by [15 - Registlet Level]%.

name: Sunbath
description: When using Emotions that increase Natural Regen, an additional [25 × Registlet Level]% of MP will be restored.

name: Hard Hit Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Hard Hit** by 5% per Level.

name: Sonic Blade Extender
description: Extends the time you must reuse **Sonic Blade** to turn it into **Super Sonic Blade** by 1 second per Level.

name: Power Shot Boost
description: Raises the power of **Power Shot** by 15% per Registlet Level when Tumble is inflicted.

name: Bullseye Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Bullseye** by 5% per Level.

name: Magic: Arrows Enhancer
description: Adds 1 shot per Level to the skill **Magic: Arrows**

name: Magic: Wall Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Magic: Wall** by 5% per Level.

name: Smash Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Smash** by 5% per Level if used with knuckles.

name: Sonic Wave Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Sonic Wave** by 5% per Level if used with knuckles.

name: Twin Slash Enhancer
description: Raises the critical damage from **Twin Slash** by 1% per Level.

name: Cross Parry Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Cross Parry** by 5% per Level

name: Flash Stab Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Flash Stab** by 5% per Level.

name: Cannon Spear Enhancer
description: Adds a [10 × Level]% chance of inflicting **Flinch** to the first attack of the skill **Cannon Spear**

name: Issen Enhancer
description: Raises the power of the second hit of **Issen** by 5% per Registlet.

name: Pommel Strike Enhancer
description: Extends the duration of **Paralysis** caused by the skill **Pommel Strike** by 1 second per Level.

name: Poison Heal
description: [Level]% chance of having **Poison** status removed when taking damage inflicted by **Poison**.

name: Cat's Eye
description: A **miss** hit while you are **Blind** may be turned into a **graze** hit when possible.

name: Emergency HP Heal
description:
Instantly restores [10 + Level]% of your HP when there is only 25% or less due to monster's attacks. 
Cooldown: 60 seconds

name: Emergency MP Heal
description:
Immediately restores [10 × Level] MP if there is not enough MP.
Cooldown: 60 seconds

name: Neural Control
description: Reduces the amount of ASPD lowered due to Paralysis by 2% per Level.

name: Final Resistance
description:
If you get knocked out last in the party, you will squeeze out every last bit of your strength to quickly revive for [5 + Level] seconds before becoming unable to battle again.
∗ First Aid, Struggle, Revive Droplets Unavailable

name: Elemental Trigger Slash
description: Converts the element of **Trigger Slash** from fire to that of the weapon equipped.

name: Spiral Air Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Spiral Air** by 2% per Level.

name: Arrow Rain Enhancer
description: An additional attack is added to the skill **Arrow Rain** per Level.

name: Paralysis Shot Extender
description: Extends the duration of buff from the skill **Paralysis Shot** by 1 second per Level.

name: Magic: Lances Catalyst
description: Shortens the interval between shots of the skill **Magic: Lances** by 0.1 seconds per Level.

name: Magic: Blast Catalyst
description: Shortens the time to cast the skill **Magic: Blast** by 0.2 seconds per Level.

name: Power Wave Modifier
description:
Modifies the effect of **Power Wave** so that it raises normal attack power by [⌈(Registlet Level + Power Wave Level) × 0.5⌉]% instead of extending the range.
∗ The increment depends on the skill level.

name: Shell Break Enhancer
description: Raises the chance to inflict Armor Break with the skill **Shell Break** by 5% per Level.

name: Earthbind Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Earthbind** by 5% per Registlet Level if used with knuckles.

name: Spinning Slash Compress
description: Reduces the range of **Spinning Slash** and removes the knock back effect, but raises its power by 5% per Level.

name: Critical Charging Slash
description: Lowers the power of **Charging Slash** by [110 - (10 × Level)]% and guarantees a critical hit.

name: Dragon Tail Enhancer
description: Raises the power of the second hit of **Dragon Tail** by 5% per Level.

name: Mega War Cry of Struggle
description: Increases the aggro generated by the skill **War Cry of Struggle** by 300 per Level.

name: Static Triple Thrust
description: You will remain in the same spot when using the skill **Triple Thrust**

name: Magadachi Amulet
description: Raises magic damage reduction by the skill **Magadachi** by 5% per Level.

name: Meikyo Shisui Preserver
description: The effect from **Meikyo Shisui** remains when using a skill.

name: Steady Stance
description: Reduces damage taken while afflicted with Stop by 3% per Level if you stand still.

name: Shared Destiny
description:
Each party member excluding you will raise ATK and MATK by 1%, but [110 - (10 × Level)]% of HP will be lost whenever a member gets knocked out.
∗ This HP loss could knock player out.

name: Forty Winks
description: Shortens Sleep duration by 10% per Level.

name: Tanker's Pet
description: Lowers the damage received by pet by 3% per Level, but greatly increases the damage received by its owner.

name: Last Hero
description:
Restores [10 + Level]% of your HP and MP per knocked out party member when you are the only one left.
Cooldown: 300 seconds

name: Monophobia
description:
Restores 100 HP per 10 seconds when near a party member, but when not, 100 HP will be lost. Range is [3 + Level] meters.
∗ This HP loss won't knock player out.

name: Pyrexia
description: The chance of having Freeze status removed if you do a normal attack while frozen increases by 5% per Level.

name: Impetus
description: Reduces movement speed decline due to Slow by 5% per Level.

name: Silent Recharge
description: Increase amount of MP recovered by 5% per Level if **MP Charge** is used while afflicted with Silence.

name: Attacker's Pet
description: Raises the damage dealt by pet by 3% per Level, but greatly decreases its owner's.

name: Mana Thrash
description:
Raises normal attack power in exchange for Attack MP Recovery.
∗ Power increases more with higher Attack MP Recovery.

name: Parsimony
description:
Instead of consuming a triggered auto-item, the item cooldown is doubled.
Cooldown: [40 - Level] seconds.

name: Emergency Repair
description: There is a [5 × Level]% chance of having Armor Break status removed when the damage taken increases because of it.

name: Mana Defuser
description: Immediately restores 100 MP if you survive a Mana Explosion.

name: Coffee Break
description:
Restores 10% of your HP when you defeat a monster.
Cooldown: [30 - Level] seconds.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Reduces damage taken from behind (opposite camera direction) by 1% per Level. The damage will be further reduced when taken from directly behind.

name: Savior
description: Grants a 10-second invincibility if you revive when all of your party members get knocked out.

name: Remedial Rampage
description: Removes the finishing attack of the skill **Rampage** and restores 50 HP per Level.

name: Sword Tempest Extender
description: Adds 1 hit to the skill **Sword Tempest**.

name: Smoke Dust Extender
description: Extends the duration of buff from the skill **Smoke Dust** by 1 second per Level.

name: Piercing Heavy Smash
description: Adds [5 × Level]% Physical Pierce to the skill **Heavy Smash** if used with knuckles.

name: Phantom Slash Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Phantom Slash** by 5% per Level.

name: Focus Dive Impact
description: Turns the skill **Dive Impact** into an attack that pierces through a single target. Resistance to Dazzled is shortened by 2 seconds per Level.

name: Pursuit Relief
description: Reduces damage taken by 1% per Level when you can't move while afflicted with Flinch, Tumble, or Stun.

name: Burning Spirit
description: Restores MP as much as [5 × Level]% of your Attack MP Recovery when taking damage inflicted by Ignite.

name: Bloody Warrior
description: Raises normal attack power and Attack MP Recovery by 5% per Level while afflicted with Bleed.

name: Monster Hunter
description:
Restores 100 MP when you defeat a monster.
Cooldown: [30 - Level] seconds.

name: Panic
description: Restores [10 × Level] MP every 3 seconds, but all MP will be lost if you get aggro and this Registlet will be suspended for 30 seconds.

name: Transfer
description:
Lowers MaxMP by [1100 - (100 × Level)], but when you are knocked out, the remaining MP will be shared among your party members.
∗ Players whose MP gets restored by this effect cannot enjoy the same effect for 180 seconds.

name: Dominant War Cry
description: Activation of **War Cry** will not be interrupted by Fear.

name: Berserk Control
description: For each level of **Berserk**, 10% chance to prevent **Rampage** from being cancelled.

name: Decoy Shot Compress
description: Halves the duration of **Decoy Shot** but increases the power by 10% per Level.

name: Frugal Shield Bash
description: Restores [10 × Level] MP when **Shield Bash** inflicts **Stun**.

name: Extra Recovery
description: Adds a HP recovery effect to the skill **Recovery**. The amount of HP restored is [10 × Level]% of the HP recovered by the **Mini Heal** learned.

name: Frugal Heal
description: Reduces the MP Cost of the skill **Heal** by 100.

name: Extreme Whack
description: Increases the activation rate of **Whack** by 1% per Level.

name: Extreme Concentrate
description: Increases the activation rate of **Concentrate** by 1% per Level.

name: Secret Chase ATK Boost
description: Increases the activation rate of additional attack of **Secret Chase Attac** by 1% per level of the skill acquired.

name: Power Resonance
description: **Resonance** will only enhance stats that affect firepower, but the enhancement is reduced by [95 - (5 × Level)]%.

name: Universal Ether Flare
description: **Ether Flare** will recover Attack MP even if the element is not the target's weakness.

name: Bloody Bite Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Bloody Bite** by 10% per Level.

name: Full Power Qi Charge
description: When **Qi Charge** gives no effect, qi will increase by [10 × Level]% if the skill is activated using 2000 MP.

name: Single Meteor Strike
description: Reduces the number of meteorites dropped from **Meteor Strike** to 1, but the drop point will no longer be random. It will no longer inflict status ailments either.

name: Start Dash
description:
Normal attack has 0 second cooldown for [5 + Level] seconds when getting aggro from the target monster for the first time.
Cooldown: 60 seconds

name: Secret Combo
description: Reduces aggro by [Level]% per 1 combo. Better effect with longer combo.

name: Zero Stance
description: Damage dealt with skill activated without using a combo is multiplied by [1 + (0.01 × Level)]. *Does not apply to some skills such as charge skills.

name: Express Assault Attack
description: Removes **Knock Back** and **Slow** from **Assault Attack** and increases its power by 10% per Level

name: Rage Sword Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Rage Sword** by 10% per Level. Aggro doubles if the target is hostile towards you.

name: Mega Royal Heal
description: The range of **Royal Heal** effect is increased by 1m per Level, but the amount of HP restores is halved.

name: Tricky Shadow Walk
description: Additional attack of **Shadow Walk** will no longer cause proration.

name: Comrade Familia
description: The chance of the familiar summoned with **Familia** fleeing is reduced by 1%. Movement becomes 1 second faster for Advanced Familiar.

name: Speed Resonance
description: **Resonance** will only enhance stats that affect acceleration, but the enhancement is reduced by [95 - (5 × Level)]%.

name: Short Performance
description:
Shortens the duration of dance skill effect by 5 seconds.
*Does not apply to Spirited Dance.

name: Silent P. Defense
description: Reduces the aggro generated when P. Defense is successful by [10 × Level]%

name: Binding Strike Modifier
description: Modifies **Binding Strike** so that it inflicts **Stun** to the target only and the **Stop** effect is removed.

name: Holy Light Retribution
description: There is a 1% chance that Lv[Registlet Level] light element Magic: Finale will activate when **Holy Light** hits the target.

name: Assassin Stab Enhancer
description: Raises the power of **Assassin Stab** by [Level]%. Furthermore, the accuracy is raised by [10 × Level]% if it is Back Stab.

name: Mana Crystal Catalyst
description: Reduces the casting time of **Mana Crystal** by [10 × Level]%, but the amount of MP recovered gets reduced by 100.

name: Chancy Trap
description: Enables a trap skill to be set at the target's feet, but if it activates immediately, you will also be affected.

name: Focus Demon Claw
description: The power of **Demon Claw** is reduced by 100% but the skill will focus on attacking a single target

name: Focus Resonance
description: **Resonance** will only enhance stats that affect concentration and precision, but the enhancement is reduced by [95 - (5 × Level)]%.

name: Heal Bank
description:
The amount of HP recovered by **Mini Heal** and **Heal** is halved.
Accumulates up to [Level] stacks of buff every 3 sec. When using the skill to heal an ally, the buff is consumed instead of MP to activate it.

name: Guitarist
description:
Shortens the time for song effect to increase when used continuously by [Level] sec, but aggro and damage received while singing increase by 10%.
*Does not apply to Fantasy Song.
